name: BULLCRAP!
description:
BULLCRAP is a game of lies, poop and deceit!

Play online with up to Four of your friends,
or play solo over 7 Chapters of increasingly fun and challenging levels.

FEATURES

  • Meet Bucky the Bull and his untrustworthy farmyard friends!
  • Call BULLCRAP! to punish your friends!
  • Bend the rules of the game with Wild Cards!
  • Combine Wild Cards to Power Up!
  • Unleash Chaos upon the farm!
  • Things are going to get messy, it’s time to play Dirty!

GAMEPLAY

The goal of the game is to get rid of all of your cards.

You can do this by Lying, or telling the Truth!
When you think someone is lying, call "BULLCRAP!".
If they were lying, they have to pick up all the cards.
However, if they are telling the truth you pick up all the cards.
Bluffing and taking a Risk is all part of the fun!

Wild Cards add an element of chaos to the game,
meaning you'll need to switch up your strategy and learn new tricks!

Inspired by the classic bluff turn-based card game sometimes known as Cheat or Bullsh*t!
This is a game for the Deceitful, Courageous and the Bold!
